data.name: PP Puncher Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Tracks that are directly used by the game. The OST is subject to change, but old versions of tracks will still be here.
Of course, when the game is updated, the OST is being updated as well, though there might be some delay between the game update and the OST update.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 72 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Last updated when the soundtrack had 16 tracks. I might forget to update the space requirement when updating the OST.
